summary: Email correspondence between legal personnel regarding a request to provide a secure laptop to Ghislaine Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) for discovery review in her case. The emails discuss technical requirements, approval from BOP legal, and a target delivery date of November 16, 2020.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the laptop request; she is incarcerated at MDC and needs a laptop to review discovery materials for her case.

events.title: Initial laptop request discussion
events.description: Email exchange begins regarding the need to provide a laptop to Ghislaine Maxwell at MDC for discovery review.

events.title: BOP legal requirements clarified
events.description: An email summarizes requirements from BOP legal for the laptop: disabled communications, no games/entertainment, and disabled audio/video recording.

events.title: Target laptop delivery date
events.description: If approved, the aim is to deliver the laptop to MDC on this date.

keyFacts: Legal personnel are arranging a secure laptop for Ghislaine Maxwell to review discovery while incarcerated at MDC.
BOP legal specified the laptop must have all communications (wifi/bluetooth), games/entertainment programs, and audio/video recording capabilities disabled.
The request references a similar arrangement made previously in the Avenatti case.
The target delivery date for the laptop, if approved, was November 16, 2020.
